task.title: French Toast for Mom or Armando
task.shortdesc: For this recipe, Mom or Armando will need the following ingredients: 8 Silces of French Bread, Vegan French for Armando, 2 cups of milk, soy or rice milk for Armando, 2 tablespoons butter, 4 tablespoons tofu for Hermando, 2 teaspoons of cinnamon, 1 teaspoon vanilla

step.cmd: In blender, blend all ingredients except the bread. Transfer the mixtrure in a short bowl
Dip slices of bread in appropriate batter, and add extra cinamon to liking
Place bread in frying pan over medium heat and simmer until brown on each side
Top with fresh fruit if available
